Carbonhydrate.NAME: Carbonhydrate
Carbonhydrate.FLAVOR: Lack of a proper diet can yield to adverse health effects and poor physical condition.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySlowed enemies begin with an additional three #ySlow.

Chronometer.NAME: Chronometer
Chronometer.FLAVOR: Proper measurement yields greater efficiency, or so you have been taught.
DESCRIPTIONS: Retained cards cost 1 energy less until played, and you're immune to Confusion.

Chronograph.NAME: Chronograph
DESCRIPTIONS: Retained cards cost 1 energy less until played, are upgraded for the battle, and you're immune to Confusion.

Cryopreserver.NAME: Cryopreserver
Cryopreserver.FLAVOR: Freshness is key to retaining great flavour.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yFocus, making Replicas last a turn longer.

HangingClock.NAME: Hanging Clock
HangingClock.FLAVOR: Strangely, the hands on this clock only move when you do. And they only count down.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b12 cards, your turn is ended.
Gain [R] at the start of each turn.

Lockbox.NAME: Lockbox
Lockbox.FLAVOR: Keep your valuables safe and sound, and gain access when you need them!

Metronome.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 additional card at the beginning of battle. #yRetain #b1 additional card each turn.
